title: Bug 4971 - Unexpected 'copy package' behavior
description: When attempting to perform a 'copy package' operation in 'jdt.ui', the resulting package name is incorrect. Instead of the expected 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui', the package is named 'ui'.
OB: After performing the 'copy package' operation, the destination package is named 'ui'.
EB: The destination package should be named 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open the 'jdt.ui' project
2. Select the 'xxx' package
3. Choose the 'Copy' option
4. Select 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' as the destination
5. Verify that the copied package is named 'ui' instead of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'
